name: Nova
long_description:
Nova helps sellers focus their time where it will have the greatest impact, by identifying next best actions across the entire pipeline. No more dropped balls, no funnel leakage.

Understand the fundamental flow of customers and revenue over time, what role each team member plays, and what needs to happen to achieve your big hairy audacious goals.
one_liner: Nova puts the power of AI to work for you, enabling a more continuousâ€¦
